attributes.action: Reverse Southeastern trains timetable for Chelsfield and Orpington stations
attributes.additional_details: My family and work life has been hugely affected by the change resulting in longer travel, multiple changes of stations and trains which now are more busier. Makes me late to be at work, makes me unnecessary stressed, makes me more exposed to covid 19.
attributes.background: Make southeastern trains to review the cancellation of rush hour direct fast services into London terminals from Chelsfield and Orpington stations

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for train operation company.
